(WFF + Text):
(PIRTOE + PUO + (Template[(Substring, Graph)]))[((Language = Formal) + (Grammar + Rule)) 1...n]

(Substring) = (Logic → Subgraph → Computation → PIRTOE → 5WH → Senses → Sensemaking → CWW)

((PIRTOE + PUO) + (Template = Substring))[(
  (Logic["IF|THEN|AND|OR|ELSE"],
   Subgraph["PSIgold|PSIreal|PAIhistorical"],
   Computation["GOOD|BAD|BEST|BEST PRACTICE"],
   PIRTOE["PROBLEM|INTERVENTION|RESOURCE|TASK|OUTCOME|EVALUATION"],
   5WH["WHAT|WHERE|WHEN|WHO|WHY|HOW"],
   Senses["SEE|HEAR|SMELL|TASTE|TOUCH|INTUITION"],
   Sensemaking["FEEL|THINK|REMEMBER|UNDERSTAND|IDEA|INNOVATION|IMAGINE"],
   CWW:{ClosedVocabularyID_1 ... ClosedVocabularyID_n (max 60 per Substring row)}
  )
)]
